title: Living tomorrow. No. 102
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Mixing of two unnamed chemicals to make a foam splint for broken limbs; fibre optics and the use in everyday life; lipids and their use in eradicating mosquitos and also in dispersing oil spills.
